short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use Chat GPT with other way

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension facilitates voice chat support with GPT, offering prominent features such as converting speech to text, turning GPT responses into speech, suggesting better-phrased sentences, enabling the creation of conversational scripts with GPT, making conversations more focused and natural. It allows customization of speaking speed and voice to cater to users of varying proficiency levels.
